verses.plain: Be merciful unto me, O God: for man would swallow me up; he fighting daily oppresseth me.

tokens.t: Be merciful unto me, O God: for man would swallow me up; he fighting daily oppresseth me.

verses.plain: Mine enemies would daily swallow me up: for they be many that fight against me, O thou most High.

tokens.t: Mine enemies would daily swallow
up: for
many that fight against me, O thou most High.

verses.plain: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.

tokens.t: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.

verses.plain: In God I will praise his word, in God I have put my trust; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me.

tokens.t: In God I will praise his word, in God I have put my trust; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me.

verses.plain: Every day they wrest my words: all their thoughts are against me for evil.

tokens.t: Every day they wrest my words: all their thoughts
against me for evil.

verses.plain: They gather themselves together, they hide themselves, they mark my steps, when they wait for my soul.

tokens.t: They gather themselves together, they hide themselves, they mark my steps, when they wait for my soul.

verses.plain: Shall they escape by iniquity? in thine anger cast down the people, O God.

tokens.t: Shall they escape by iniquity? in
anger cast down the people, O God.

verses.plain: Thou tellest my wanderings: put thou my tears into thy bottle: are they not in thy book?

tokens.t: Thou tellest my wanderings: put thou my tears into thy bottle:
not in thy book?

verses.plain: When I cry unto thee, then shall mine enemies turn back: this I know; for God is for me.

tokens.t: When I cry
, then shall mine enemies turn back: this I know; for God
for me.

verses.plain: In God will I praise his word: in the LORD will I praise his word.

tokens.t: In God will I praise
word: in the
will I praise
word.

verses.plain: In God have I put my trust: I will not be afraid what man can do unto me.

tokens.t: In God have I put my trust: I will not be afraid what man can do unto me.

verses.plain: Thy vows are upon me, O God: I will render praises unto thee.

tokens.t: Thy vows
upon me, O God: I will render praises unto thee.

verses.plain: For thou hast delivered my soul from death: wilt not thou deliver my feet from falling, that I may walk before God in the light of the living?

tokens.t: For thou hast delivered my soul from death:
not
my feet from falling, that I may walk before God in the light of the living?

footnotes.text: Michtam…: or, A golden Psalm of David
